title: Castalia site down
author: VD
content_html:
I heard from the technical gentlemen. It’s no big deal, just some ISP-related stuff. It should be back up on Friday, Saturday at the latest.

We apologize for the inconvenience.
content_text:
I heard from the technical gentlemen. It’s no big deal, just some ISP-related stuff. It should be back up on Friday, Saturday at the latest.
